results.title: Does Low Dose Angiotensin Converting Enzyme Inhibitor Prevent Pneumonia in Older People With Neurologic Dysphagia--A Randomized Placebo-Controlled Trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Low dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ given to older tube-fed @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Deglutition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003680 @@@neurologic dysphagia@@@ resulted in increased mortality, although swallowing function showed marginal improvement.

citations.NLM: Lee JS, Chui PY, Ma HM, Auyeung TW, Kng C, Law T, Ng LK, Tam KF, Tang WH, Chan BY, Tong MC, Wong KT, Yuen YH, Yuk KL, Kwok T. Does Low Dose Angiotensin Converting Enzyme Inhibitor Prevent Pneumonia in Older People With Neurologic Dysphagia--A Randomized Placebo-Controlled Trial. J Am Med Dir Assoc. 2015 Aug 1;16(8):702-7. PMID: 26123256
citations.BibTeX: @article{26123256, title={Does Low Dose Angiotensin Converting Enzyme Inhibitor Prevent Pneumonia in Older People With Neurologic Dysphagia--A Randomized Placebo-Controlled Trial.}, author={Lee JS and Chui PY and Ma HM and Auyeung TW and Kng C and Law T and Ng LK and Tam KF and Tang WH and Chan BY and Tong MC and Wong KT and Yuen YH and Yuk KL and Kwok T}, journal={J Am Med Dir Assoc}, volume={16}, number={8}, pages={702-7}}

results.title: Controlling hypertension and hypotension immediately post-stroke (CHHIPS): a randomised, placebo-controlled, double-blind pilot trial.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ who had @DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@cerebral infarction@@@ or @DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@cerebral haemorrhage@@@ and were @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ (systolic blood pressure [SBP] >160 mm Hg) were randomly assigned by secure internet central randomisation to receive oral @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, or placebo if they were non-dysphagic, or intravenous @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@, sublingual @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, or placebo if they had @<m>DISEASE_Deglutition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003680 @@@dysphagia@@@, within 36 h of symptom onset in this double-blind pilot trial.

citations.NLM: Potter JF, Robinson TG, Ford GA, Mistri A, James M, Chernova J, Jagger C. Controlling hypertension and hypotension immediately post-stroke (CHHIPS): a randomised, placebo-controlled, double-blind pilot trial. Lancet Neurol. 2009 Jan;8(1):48-56. PMID: 19058760
citations.BibTeX: @article{19058760, title={Controlling hypertension and hypotension immediately post-stroke (CHHIPS): a randomised, placebo-controlled, double-blind pilot trial.}, author={Potter JF and Robinson TG and Ford GA and Mistri A and James M and Chernova J and Jagger C}, journal={Lancet Neurol}, volume={8}, number={1}, pages={48-56}}
